title: NA dc'd even though all all programs are working
body:
EDIT: its the new patch, my b

just dc'd in the game. waiting 1 min nothing happened. whole time im able to browse my internet.

decided to close client and re-open. client doesnt load and when i do end up logging in it says "an unexpected error occured" and kicks me off the client.

wowzers. 

hope i dont get punished for leaving even though it isnt my fault lol
